scheme_name: Nirman Shramik Auzaar Toolkit Sahayata Yojana
brief_description: The NIRMAN SHRAMIK AUZAAR TOOLKIT SAHAYATA YOJANA is a social welfare scheme launched by the Government of Jharkhand to provide financial assistance to registered construction workers in the state for the purchase of essential tools and equipment required for their work.
detailed_description:
The NIRMAN SHRAMIK AUZAAR TOOLKIT SAHAYATA YOJANA is a social welfare scheme launched by the Government of Jharkhand to provide financial assistance to registered construction workers in the state for the purchase of essential tools and equipment required for their work.
> **Objectives** 1. To improve the working conditions and productivity of construction workers in Jharkhand. 1. To reduce the financial burden on construction workers for purchasing essential tools and equipment. 1. To promote the overall socio-economic development of construction workers in the state.
benefits: Actual cost of purchasing tools/toolkit or ₹ 2,000/-, whichever is less
eligibility_criteria: The applicant must be a native of the Rajasthan state. The applicant must be a registered construction worker for 3 years. Amount payable only on purchasing tools/toolkits related to one's work or business. The purchase of tools/toolkits will be done by the construction worker himself and the bill is required to be attached to the application.

steps: Step-1: Applicant have to visit the official portal .
Step-2: Click on the option " Register ".
Step-3: Then you will be redirected to the SSO registration page. The registration page will appear with the following options.
Step-4: Choose the either one option from the Jan Aadhaar Or Google to process further.

Jan Aadhaar : Enter the Jan Aadhaar number, click on the ‘Next' button, Select your name, the name of the head of the family and all the other members and Click on the ‘Send OTP' button. Enter the ‘OTP' and Click on the ‘Verify OTP' button to Complete the registration.

Google : Enter the Gmail ID, click on the ‘Next' button, Enter the password. A new link appear on screen, now click on the new SSO link. SSO id will appear on the screen, now create the password. Enter Mobile number, click on registration.
Step-1: Applicant have to visit the official portal .
Step-2: After login, dashboard will open.
Step-4: In LDMS, select "Welfare Schemes" from the side menu and select BOCW Welfare Board.
Step-5: Now click on "Apply for Scheme" on screen.
Step-6: In this new page, will get a list of names of all the schemes of Rajasthan Shramik Card, out of which click on the name of "Yojana"
Step-7: Fill out the all relevant detail.

documents_required: Copy of the registration identity card of the beneficiary. Copy the first page of the beneficiary's bank account passbook (the beneficiary's name, bank account number, and IFSC code are mentioned). Copy of the beneficiary's Aadhar card and Bhamashah card. Copy of sales receipt of tools/toolkit.
